actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A joint resolution to recognize and commend the Battle of the Bulge Historical Foundation in its efforts to create a gallery in the United States Army Museum, Fort George G. Meade, Maryland, to commemorate the Battle of the Bulge.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress recognizes and commends the efforts of the Battle of the Bulge Historical Foundation to provide for the installation of a special gallery at the United States Army Museum at Fort George G. Meade, Maryland, devoted to the collection, preservation, and exhibition of military artifacts relating to the Battle of the Bulge.

titles.title: A joint resolution to recognize and commend the Battle of the Bulge Historical Foundation in its efforts to create a gallery in the United States Army Museum, Fort George G. Meade, Maryland, to commemorate the Battle of the Bulge.
